border-color-focus.comment: Should be used for all form-elements when the component has active or focus state and it's needed to render border attribute, or combined with shadows.

border-color-error.comment: Should be used for all form-elements when the component has error state and it's needed to render border attribute, or combined with shadows.

border-color-error-hover.comment: Should be used for all form-elements when the component has error and hover state and it's needed to render border attribute, or combined with shadows.
